amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 439, regarding methane emissions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 439, regarding methane emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 240 (Roll no. 434).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
